attributes.action: Outlaw in full all aspects of religion, religious education, publications, establishments and groups within the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove the chorosive influence of religions in society; from the denial of scientific fact to the enforced marriages and genital mutilation that often occur. To create an atheist society based around scientific endeavour and minds free from superstition. As everyone is essentially born atheist, there should be no opportunity for schools, institusions, parents or anyone else from forcing their unproven and unprovable beliefs down anyones throats.

rejection.details:
This petition is very similar to several others
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/abolishreligion/ http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Religions/ http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/endfaithschools/

Please consider signing one of those, rather than setting up your own.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
